casebody.data:
Third Department,

March, 1963**

(March 13, 1963) In the Matter of the Probate of the Will of Monroe L. Dix, Deceased. Rose Selby et al., Appellants; Chemical Bank New York Trust Company, as Temporary Administrator, et al., Respondents.

Not published with other decisions of March 13, 1963, 18 A D 2d 1032.— [Rep.

Orders affirmed, with costs to all parties filing briefs payable from the estate. No opinion. Bergan, P. J., Herlihy and Reynolds, JJ., concur; Taylor, J., not voting.
